title: Keep It 2 Virgils
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we share our thoughts on looting vs peaceful protesting, police strategically placing bricks and hammers around the city,  influencers doing it for the gram and more.

Wellness Segment - Community Resources:

Mental Health Professionals working Pro Bono https://twitter.com/ajscribes/status/1267142268571410433?s=20

Lawyers Assisting Arrested Protestors Pro Bono https://twitter.com/riyakatariax/status/1266856139536207872?s=20

List of Black Owned Farms + Food Gardens https://twitter.com/lifeinherlane/status/1267634324658180097?s=20

Thread of Black Owned Businesses https://twitter.com/_toriii/status/1266379899083919360?s=20

Black Business of the Week: Hair Paint Wax http://hairpaintwax.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Ben & Jerry’s - The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between! Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com

Aveo Vision - Daily contact lenses are easy and convenient, which are two things we need right now. AND they’re the most hygienic option. That’s why you need Aveo [uh-VAY-oh] contacts: daily contacts at an affordable price delivered right to your door. It’s the only subscription contact lens company that offers both regular daily contacts and daily toric contacts for astigmatism. Their exclusive AquaLock technology keeps lenses hydrated and comfortable–– even after 12 hours. PLUS Aveo lets you customize your delivery schedule and personalize your plan. It’s worry-free too: Aveo contacts are manufactured in a state-of-the-art, clean room facility that’s fully automated — and they ship on their own (so no third party markups). Here’s one more reason to give them a try: Aveo is donating a portion of all sales to Direct Relief, providing masks, gloves, and other protective gear to our healthcare heroes https://aveovision.com

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast 

Have a GREAT day!
